title: Police: 18-month old dead after shooting in Beebe
content:
The Beebe Police Department confirms an 18-month old is dead after an apparent shooting in Beebe July 8. (KATV photo)
BEEBE (KATV) — The Beebe Police Department confirms an 18-month old is dead after an apparent shooting in Beebe Friday morning.
Few details have been released at this time, but police say this incident happened at a duplex in the 300 block of Spring Street. Police were reportedly called just after 11:15 a.m.
This is a developing story. We will continue to update this story as more information becomes available. Matt Mershon will have a live report with the latest details coming up on Channel 7 News at 10.
